price: 21 L’histoire des plaideurs qui s’étaient hissés jusqu’à son oratoire t’est-elle parvenue ?
arabic: ۞ وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wahal atāka naba-u al-khaṣmi idh tasawwarū al-miḥ'rāba
